From: richard f allen <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

Enough of Hot Rod's eternal repairs were done, to bring him out of
stasis, so he awoke. He noticed that he was in car mode, was carrying
Savanna's corps, and was being dragged by a Maximal.
"What happaned? Where we going?" He then noticedthat Savanna was dead.
"No! SpitFire, Savanna, dead?!" He then turned his attension to the
Maximal dragging him.
"Who are you?"
